page.title: 13VEGETABLE PROCESSING
page.content: A major agricultural industry in this block is the vegetable processing plant at{INVERALDIE}6.5 Km. north of central Dundee. It employs about 40 people (mostly women) and is noted for its{PEELED POTATOES}and processed vegetables which include leeks, carrots, turnips, onions and cabbage but they also sell fruit. Vegetables and fruit are obtained from{GLASGOW {FRUIT MARKET}and brought back to Inveraldie for processing. There are several chemical processes to preserve them and keep their colour. They are delivered as far afield as Glasgow and Aberdeen, mostly to hospitals, schools, hotels and{PRESTWICK AIRPORT. Onions are delivered to{DYCE}for a meat packing firm. Waste is sent to the local piggery.
